long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert Feet into Meters on YouTube videos. Whenever a measurement is given in Feet on a YouTube video, click on the MetricWeb button to get the Metric conversion as a caption. 

The Metric conversion is rounded to 2 significant digits for quick reading. So, 4 Feet would convert to 1.2 Meters, while 420 Feet would convert to 130 Meters.

Each time you click on the MetricWeb button, 2 minutes of the video are transcribed into Metric. Each video can have a total of 10 minutes transcribed. 

Other supported conversions include:
Inch → Centimeter
Mile → Kilometer
Pound → Kilogram
Ounce → Gram
Fahrenheit → Celsius
Gallon → Liter
